snippet: Brown-Forman, the American spirits maker, said its Southern Comfort and Tuaca brands would be sold to the Louisiana-based Sazerac.
abstract: Brown-Forman will sell its Southern Comfort and Tuaca liqueur brands to Sazerac for $475 million.
lead_paragraph: Brown-Forman, the American spirits maker, said its Southern Comfort and Tuaca brands would be sold to the Louisiana-based Sazerac.

headline.print_headline: Brown-Forman to Sell Southern Comfort and Tuaca
headline.main: Brown-Forman to Sell Southern Comfort and Tuaca
